name: Fiki
description: '''Fikret Tuncher Ali''' ({{langx|bg|Фикрет Тунчер Али}}; {{langx|tr|Fikret Tunçer Ali}}; born 3 March 1995), better known under his stage name '''Fiki Storaro''' ({{langx|bg|Фики Стораро}}) or simply '''Fiki''', is a [[Bulgaria]]n pop-folk singer of [[Turks of Bulgaria|Turkish]] descent. He is the son of singer [[Toni Storaro]].
